National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connect icut Avenue
March 7, 1962 Washington 6, D. C.
BOOK MESSAGE_SEE ATTACHED LIST OF ADPRESSESS
House today passed ETV bill 336 - 68 amended to include restricted
closed circuit associated with broadcasting stations and limit
eligibility for grants solely to educational institutions. Leadership
confident community television corporations eligibility can be restored
in conference.
William G. Harley
